Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights business trip staff extremely friendly hotel flashback 80s mismatched furniture combining tudor chinese elements pretty basically lower price airier convenient hotel berlin

Reviews.Content: husband stayed western hotel president december 2010 location fantastic 5 minute walk nearest underground station direction street shops oxford street london aware check 2pm staff luggage storage whilst explored sized huge window looking front hotel lots storage space suitcases table chairs desk tv mention lighting wasnt bedside lamps plus floor lamp light hallway nice create ambiance considering travelled winter days short nice brighter lights compliant wouldnt stop recommending hotel nor staying bathroom clean tidy fridge didnt day didnt anyway book ths hotel check join door walls thin unfortunately noisy neighbours woke night loud drunken conversations nice priced hotel excellent location isnt noisy short walk shopping metro berlin size bed comfortable staff left box chocolates outside door day checked sweet definitely recommend
